root.name: Ironclad Tactics
root.description: OverviewIronclad Tactics is a realtime tactical card game made by Zachtronics Industries, known for their previous game, SpaceChem. The game is announced to feature at least 80 unique cards to play with, a story mode that can be played solo or in cooperative mode, as well as a competitive multiplayer mode called Nemesis Mode in which players may control the enemies from the story missions. The game will use an in-game graphic novel style for its storytelling.System RequirementsPCOS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Hard Drive: 700 MB available spaceMacOS: OS X 10.5.8, or later Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Hard Drive: 700 MB available spaceLinuxOS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Hard Drive: 700 MB available space
